course_description: Describes and analyzes the functioning of labor markets, the supply and demand for labor, and the determination of wages and employment. The effects of unions, institutions, and discrimination on labor markets are also considered.
prerequisites: This course requires ECON 201 OR ECON_OX201 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1132, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 10-11:15a, Instructor: K. Karbownik, Status: Open
